title: Balance Complementary Medicine - Highett, VIC
description: Specialties: Balance Complementary Medicine is a natural healthcare clinic, specialising in alternative and Chinese medicines as well as acupuncture, naturopathy and myotherapy located in the Bayside area, Melbourne. The practitioners at Balance are specialised in treating a wide range of health conditions to help you feel and look your best. We offer fertility acupuncture, IVF acupuncture, cosmetic acupuncture, Bowen therapy and many more natural therapy services. Whether you need help with an existing condition, or you want to find out the cause of your health concerns, we are here to help. We combine cutting-edge techniques with a blend of modern science and ancient wisdom to get results.
